name: stage-club-backend
description: Rest Api Stage-Club con Express y TS
author: Almonlabs

scripts.generate-models-js: sequelize-auto -h localhost -d stage_club -u root -x david -p 5432 --dialect postgres -o ./src/models
scripts.generate-models-ts: sequelize-auto -h localhost -d stage_club -u root -x david -p 5432 --dialect postgres -o ./src/models  --lang ts --useDefine true --caseModel PascalCase --caseProp camelCase
